citations.narrative:
In each individual primary enclosure for 4 adult birds including a Cooper's Hawk, Peregrine Falcon, Red-tailed Hawk and
Western Screech-Owl, there is a wall surface made of a pressed wood product. This surface has wood curls that are
peeling apart creating a rough texture. The current state of the surface does not allow it to be readily cleaned or sanitized.
Inability to properly clean and/or sanitize surfaces that birds may come into contact within their primary enclosure due to
material construction or state of disrepair may promote disease transmission to the animals. The surfaces of housing
facilities must be constructed in a manner and made of materials that allow them to be readily cleaned and/or sanitized, or
removed and replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by 13 May 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.150(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In each individual primary enclosure for 4 adult birds including a Cooper's Hawk, Peregrine Falcon, Red-tailed Hawk and 
Western Screech-Owl, there is a wall surface made of a pressed wood product. This surface has wood curls that are 
peeling apart creating a rough texture. The current state of the surface does not allow it to be readily cleaned or sanitized. 
Inability to properly clean and/or sanitize surfaces that birds may come into contact within their primary enclosure due to 
material construction or state of disrepair may promote disease transmission to the animals. The surfaces of housing 
facilities must be constructed in a manner and made of materials that allow them to be readily cleaned and/or sanitized, or 
removed and replaced when worn or soiled.  
 
Correct by 13 May 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
